attributes.action: STOP GRAVEL PITS IN HAMBLE, HAMPSHIRE C.C. ALREADY OWN LAND WITH GRAVEL AVAILABLE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
HAMPSHIRE CC HAVE LAND THEY OWN THAT CONTAIN MORE GRAVEL THAN THE SITE THEY HAVE SELACTED,WHY?
The truth is out regarding the threat of Gravel Pits in our area namely at Pickwell Farm & Hamble Airfield. Out of the 14 sites identified in South Hampshire, these are No.1 and No.2 on their preferred list!!! This is despite there being other options that would affect far fewer people! We have to stop this!  
1)  GRAVEL EXTRACTION from 2009 to 2019!!! 
Devaluation of our homes and little chance to sell!
Constant noise and air pollution (dust)!
At least 200 Trucks a day (in Hamble Lane) – total road misery!
2)    LANDFILL and then 700 HOUSES (Hamble Airfield is owned by Persimmon Homes!!) from 2019 to 2029!!!           
A major health/contamination risk on the doorstep of our homes, schools and doctors surgery! 
Overcrowding of our vital services forever! 
More constant noise (trucks beeping when reversing) & air pollution (dust/smell) 
Total road misery forever! 
The loss of Hamble Village as we know it! 
The deadline to ACT is before DECEMBER 12TH 2007!! (Phase 1 public consultation end date)
THE FIRST WE KNEW WAS A NOTE POPPED IN THE DOOR, WITH NO TIME TO PUT OUR CASE OVER
